issue.title: [Rust] Add more documentation about take
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10157](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10157). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice to have a little more documentation of what the take kernel did.
